description.value:
As part of the action used to cast this power, you must make a ranged weapon attack against one creature within your weapon's range, otherwise the power fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it becomes ignited (your techcasting ability modifier).

This power's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra [[/r 1d6]] fire damage to the target, and the ignited damage increases to [[/r 1d4]] + your tech casting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by [[/r 1d6]] and [[/r 1d4]], respectively, at 11th level and 17th level.
